original: khandhapaññatti, āyatanapaññatti, dhātupaññatti, saccapaññatti, indriyapaññatti, puggalapaññattīti.
analyzed: khandha paññatti āyatana paññatti dhātu paññatti sacca paññatti indriya paññatti puggala paññatti iti
rūpa kkhandhaḥ vedanā kkhandhaḥ saññā kkhandhaḥ saṅkhāra kkhandhaḥ viññāṇa kkhandhaḥ

original: cakkhāyatanaṁ, rūpāyatanaṁ, sotāyatanaṁ, saddāyatanaṁ, ghānāyatanaṁ, gandhāyatanaṁ, jivhāyatanaṁ, rasāyatanaṁ, kāyāyatanaṁ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ, manāyatanaṁ, dhammāyatanaṁ;
analyzed: cakkhāyatana rūpāyatana sotāyatana saddāyatana ghānāyatana gandhāyatana jivhāyatana rasāyatana kāyāyatana phoṭṭhabbāyatana manāyatana dhammāyatana

original: cakkhudhātu, rūpadhātu, cakkhuviññāṇadhātu, sotadhātu, saddadhātu, sotaviññāṇadhātu,
analyzed: cakkhu dhātu rūpa dhātu cakkhu viññāṇa dhātu sota dhātu sadda dhātu sota viññāṇa dhātu

original: ghānadhātu, gandhadhātu, ghānaviññāṇadhātu, jivhādhātu, rasadhātu, jivhāviññāṇadhātu,
analyzed: ghāna dhātu gandha dhātu ghāna viññāṇa dhātu jivhā dhātu rasa dhātu jivhā viññāṇa dhātu

original: kāyadhātu, phoṭṭhabbadhātu, kāyaviññāṇadhātu, manodhātu, dhammadhātu, manoviññāṇadhātu;
analyzed: kāya dhātu phoṭṭhabba dhātu kāya viññāṇa dhātu manaḥ dhātu dhammadhātu manas viññāṇa dhātu
dukkha sacca samudaya sacca nirodha sacca magga sacca

original: cakkhundriyaṁ, sotindriyaṁ, ghānindriyaṁ, jivhindriyaṁ, kāyindriyaṁ, manindriyaṁ,
analyzed: cakkhundriya sotindriya ghānindriya jivhindriya kāyindriya manindriya

original: itthindriyaṁ, purisindriyaṁ, jīvitindriyaṁ, sukhindriyaṁ, dukkhindriyaṁ, somanassindriyaṁ,
analyzed: itthi indriya purisa indriya jīvita indriya sukha indriya dukkha indriya somanassa indriya

original: domanassindriyaṁ, upekkhindriyaṁ, saddhindriyaṁ, vīriyindriyaṁ, satindriyaṁ, samādhindriyaṁ,
analyzed: domanassa indriya upekkhā indriya vīriya indriya sati indriya samādhi indriya
paññā indriya anaññātaññassāmi itindriya aññindriya aññātāvindriya
